4.4.2.2. Cl-: Full charge¶

To call this Molecule Type description in , use:

myMT = frog_class.MoleculeType(GP, 'Chlore', where_are_molecules)

4.4.2.2.1. Description¶

4.4.2.2.2. Test performed¶

4.4.2.2.3. Module¶

Frog.Molecules.Chlore.compute_mean_position(L_pos)[source]

Define how to compute the ‘’mean position’’ of the molecule given its position.

Frog.Molecules.Chlore.compute_rotational_matrix(L_pos)[source]

Define the matrix to go from the Molecular to the Laboratory frame: X_{lab} = Rot_matrix * X_{mol}
